title.rendered: CRC Joyous – A Luxurious Residential Project in TechZone IV, Greater Noida West

content.rendered:
CRC Joyous is a premium residential project located in TechZone IV, Greater Noida West. Developed by the renowned CRC Group, this project offers luxurious 2 and 3 BHK apartments with world-class amenities and facilities.
CRC Joyous is a premium residential project located in TechZone IV, Greater Noida West. Developed by the renowned CRC Group, this project offers luxurious 2 and 3 BHK apartments with world-class amenities and facilities. The project is strategically located near the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway, Yamuna Expressway, and FNG Expressway, making it well-connected to major parts of Delhi-NCR.

Location

CRC Joyous is located in TechZone IV, Greater Noida West, which is a rapidly developing area with excellent infrastructure and connectivity. The project is just a few minutes away from the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway, which connects it to major parts of Delhi-NCR. The upcoming metro station is also nearby, making it easy for residents to commute to different parts of the city. The project is surrounded by several schools, hospitals, shopping malls, and other amenities, making it an ideal location for families.

The project is well-connected to major parts of Delhi-NCR through the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway, Yamuna Expressway, and FNG Expressway. The upcoming metro station is just a few minutes away from the project, making it easy for residents to commute to different parts of the city.

Amenities

The project offers a wide range of amenities and facilities to its residents. Some of the key highlights include:
CRC Joyous offers a wide range of amenities and facilities to its residents. The project has a well-equipped gymnasium, a swimming pool, and a clubhouse where residents can relax and unwind. There are also landscaped gardens and a children’s play area where kids can play and have fun. The project has 24/7 security and power backup to ensure the safety and comfort of its residents.

Apartments

CRC Joyous offers spacious and well-designed 2 and 3 BHK apartments that are equipped with modern amenities and facilities. The apartments have vitrified tiles in the living and dining areas, wooden flooring in the master bedroom, and high-quality bathroom fittings. The modular kitchen is equipped with a hob, chimney, and other appliances.
CRC Joyous offers spacious and well-designed 2 and 3 BHK apartments that are equipped with modern amenities and facilities. The apartments have vitrified tiles in the living and dining areas, wooden flooring in the master bedroom, and high-quality bathroom fittings. The modular kitchen is equipped with a hob, chimney, and other appliances.
CRC Joyous offers spacious and well-designed 2 and 3 BHK apartments. The apartments are equipped with modern amenities and facilities, including:

  • Modular kitchen
  • Wooden flooring in the master bedroom
  • High-quality bathroom fittings
  • Vitrified tiles in living and dining areas

Pricing

The pricing of apartments in CRC Joyous is competitive and offers value for money. The starting price of a 2 BHK apartment is INR 44 lakhs, while the starting price of a 3 BHK apartment is INR 59 lakhs.

Conclusion

Overall, CRC Joyous is a luxurious residential project that offers a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and luxury. The project’s location, amenities, and facilities make it an ideal choice for those looking for a premium residential property in Greater Noida West.CRC Group is a renowned real estate developer with several successful projects in Delhi-NCR. The group has a reputation for delivering high-quality projects on time and has won several awards for its excellence in the real estate sector.
